game.title: The Missing Treasure
game.objective: Retrieve the lost treasure from the ancient ruins.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden treasure deep within the ancient ruins. Brave adventurers are needed to uncover the truth and bring back the loot.

tasks.description: Make your way through the dense jungle and find the entrance to the ancient ruins.

tasks.objective: Solve the puzzle to unlock the door
tasks.description: Use your wits to solve the ancient puzzle and unlock the door to the treasure chamber.
Once inside, navigate through the treacherous traps and retrieve the lost treasure.
